name: ABUW_1645
Function: Key regulator of the VIR-O/AV-T high frequency phenotypic switch

name: ABUW_1645 OE
Function: iModulon capturing the overexpression of ABUW_1645 in AB5075_VIR-O_AV-T project

name: AMR
Function: Antimicrobial resistance island on p1AB5075 plasmid

name: Amino acid
Function: Manually annotated iModulon with genes associated with amino acids

name: BfmR-BfmS
Function: Two-component system regulating the pili chaperone-usher assembly system

name: GacA-GacS
Function: iModulon associated with decreased activity in GacA mutant - potential stationary phase response

name: GigA-GigB
Function: iModulon associated with decreased activity in gigA and gigB mutants

name: GigA-GigB KO
Function: Single gene iModulon capturing gigA and gigB knockouts

name: HGT
Function: Manually annotated iModulon capturing genomic transposase genes and plasmid encoded genes associated with conjugation.

name: Leucine
Function: Manually annotated iModulon with genes associated with Leucine degradation

name: Lipoprotein
Function: Increased activity in colistin and LL-37 treatment

name: LldR
Function: Transcription factor associated with lactate utilization

name: PhoR-PhoB
Function: Two-component system regulating inorganic phosphate levels

name: Pnt
Function: Pnt operon encoding subunits of NADP transhydrogenase

name: Prophage
Function: Enriched with PHASter data for three prophage regions

name: R7 mutant
Function: iModulon capturing the loss of the p1AB5075 plasmid

name: RpoH
Function: iModulon containing various heat shock proteins, chaperones, and DNA repair genes identified by comparing to E.coli PRECISE 2.0 iModulome

name: Type IV Pili
Function: Manually annotated iModulon with genes associated with type IV pili

name: Urease/Ammonia
Function: Manually annotated iModulon containing urease and ammonia transport genes

name: mumR
Function: Contains the mumR regulon homologs from ATCC 17978 associated with manganese import and urea metabolism [link]

name: ppGpp
Function: Stringent response iModulon identified by comparing to E.coli PRECISE 2.0 iModulome
